quotes.quote: InferiorsÂ revolt in order that they may be equal, and equals that they may be superior. Such is the state of mind which creates revolutions.
When an individual is kept in a situation of inferiority, the fact is that he does become inferior.
Never let yourÂ inferiorsÂ do you a favor - it will be extremely costly.
TheÂ inferiorÂ man attempts a hundred intrigues in order to save himself, but finishes only in creating a greater calamity from which he cannot run.
Superior and inferior wage one hundred battles a day.
FeelingÂ inferiorÂ is complex; being superior is easy.
While one person hesitates because he feels inferior, another is busy making mistakes and becoming superior.
It is only theÂ inferiorÂ thinker who hastens to explain the singular and the complex by the primitive shortcut of supernaturalism.
Nobody can make you feel inferior without your consent. It's not who you are that holds you back, it's who you think you're not.
The superior man understands what is right; theÂ inferiorÂ man understands what will sell.
The idea of a superior orÂ inferiorÂ race is a myth that has been completely refuted by anthropological evidence.
InferiorÂ thinking and writing will make a name for a man amongÂ inferiorÂ people, who in all ages and countries, are the majority.
Treat yourÂ inferiorsÂ as you would be treated by your betters.
You are inferior to no one. others may treat you that way, but that is their problem. You are above all of this.
There are no inferior types of fiction, only inferior practitioners of themÂ
No one can make you feel inferior unless you let them.
Nobody on the face of the earth can make you feel inferior without your permission.
But an inferior talent can only be graceful when it's carrying inferior ideas. And the more narrowly you can look at a thing the more entertaining you can be about it.
The superior man blames himself. TheÂ inferiorÂ man blames others.
You do not have an inferior function, it has you.
It is said that theÂ inferiorÂ seek to emulate the superior. Thus, if a general slackens only a little, those beneath him will be greatly negligent.
No one can make you feelÂ inferiorÂ without your consent.
Nobody is moreÂ inferiorÂ than those who insist on being equal.
